SELECT a.id,a.name_cn AS nameCn,a.element_id AS elementId,COUNT(a.element_id) AS count FROM (SELECT e.id,e.name_cn,ie.element_id,ie.info_id FROM drs_element e JOIN drs_info_element ie ON ie.element_id=e.id WHERE e.del_flag='0')a GROUP BY a.element_id ORDER BY COUNT(a.element_id) DESC LIMIT 0,9
